name: Casual TTRis 2D
description:
Casual TTRis 2D

A Minimalist T-T-Ris casual game.

Controls

A / Left Arrow : Move Left

S / Down Arrow : Quick Move Down

D / Right Arrow  : Move Right

Space Bar: Rotate the piece

M : Mute/Unmute

ESC: Quit Game

Credits

Manu Moral aka "Kreative Knowmad"

TETRIS THEME REMIX _ GAMING MUSIC - NO COPYRIGHT MUSIC
